comments: 13000 Local + National + Roaming Outgoing Seconds -- In Roaming Local & STD Outgoing Calls applicable on Idea networks Only

Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
20000 Local + National + Roaming Outgoing Seconds -- In Roaming Local & STD Outgoing Calls applicable on Idea networks Only
35000 Local + STD Seconds -- 121 DT (30 days) on auto-deactivation. If customer changes his tone during the free period will be shifted on paid DT platform and charged with Rs.39/month immediately

Unlimited Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
